messages.title: REAL CHANGE FOR BRITAIN
messages.content: Britain needs a real change after years of failure under Gordon Brown and Labour.

messages.title: Protecting our NHS and our vital public services
messages.content: Labour's waste and red tape mean that frontline public services face more cuts in the coming years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ordinary people will see their tax bills drop, while the very rich will pay more.
We will invest in our children’s future by improving schools in the UK.
We will invest in a new green economy to help people get back to work.
The Lib Dems will act to clean up politics and give people the power to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats have identified billions of pounds of Government waste that can be used to protect frontline services and start paying back the national debt.
issues.education: We will invest in our children’s future by improving schools in the UK.
issues.environment: We will invest in a new green economy to help people get back to work.
issues.governance: The Lib Dems will act to clean up politics and give people the power to sack corrupt MPs.
issues.health: Labour's waste and red tape mean that frontline public services face more cuts in the coming years.

images.caption: Nick Clegg with Vince Cable, discussing strategies.
